statements: UPDATE financial_transactions SET amount = 100.5, merchant = 'Amazon' WHERE transaction_id = 12345
UPDATE financial_transactions SET merchant = 'Walmart', amount = 75.25 WHERE customer_id = 54321
UPDATE financial_transactions SET amount = 500.75, merchant = 'Amazon', is_fraudulent = FALSE WHERE transaction_id = 100;

UPDATE financial_transactions SET fraud_score = 10, transaction_date = '2022-03-15' WHERE transaction_id = 1001;

UPDATE financial_transactions SET amount = 1500.50, is_fraud = false WHERE transaction_id = 1001

UPDATE customers SET customer_email = 'newemail@example.com', customer_phone = '+123456789' WHERE customer_id = 54321;
